name: List
title: Gcloud
Dns
Change
List
description: Change::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Dns
Change
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more changes that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Dns
Change
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more changes that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Dns
Change
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there a next page of changes.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"

changes = zone.changes
if changes.next?
  next_changes = changes.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"

changes = zone.changes
if changes.next?
  next_changes = changes.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Dns
Change
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all changes by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each change, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all changes are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each change by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
changes = zone.changes

changes.all do |change|
  puts change.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
changes = zone.changes

all_names = changes.all.map do |change|
  change.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
changes = zone.changes

changes.all(request_limit: 10) do |change|
  puts change.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all changes. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each change.
